text.text:
Welcome America and <https://gcc2021.sched.com/event/ihqk/americas-session-7|session 7 starts> in 5 mins with this incredible lineup:

- Galaxy Training Network (GTN) Community Update, Helena Rasche, Saskia Hiltemann
- Using the Galaxy (Australia) Database to Aid an Undergraduate Investigation of RNF43 Mutations as Biomarkers for ctDNA Surveillance of Colorectal Cancer, Jordon Lima
- Open Life Science: An Open Research mentoring and training program, Muhammet A. Celik
- Galaxy Australia - the influx state of a national eResearch service, Gareth Price
- Community engagement and how it influences Galaxy Australia Innovation, Johan Gustafsson

Captions for individual talks can be accessed with the [CC] icon on the video.
